settings.text:
Hello there, I'm Roze. I'm the owner and operator of DD Succulents, and myfriendroze. My name is not DD, but I answer to that now too. D.D stands for death's door- and as I like to say "buy them before I can kill them"!

You see, I love succulents and cacti (to death sometimes). I started hoarding (buying) succulents eons ago, but when the pandemic hit- my addiction kicked into full gear. Rather than go to rehab, I decided, this was my calling. At the same time, I
"left" my career in the music industry, and also decided to finally dust off my art degree and start making things that would go with the plants. So now if you buy a planter you can say myfriendroze made it!
